ActionBarIndicator_Tooltip_SkeletonMage: Skeletal Mages bombard enemies with spells at range.
ActionBarIndicator_Tooltip_SkeletonWarri: Skeletal Warriors attack enemies at close range with their weapons.
GolemSpec1_Desc: A horrid protector that taunts enemies, forcing them to attack the Golem.
GolemSpec2_Desc: Drains Life from nearby enemies to heal and bolster itself.
GolemSpec3_Desc: An amalgamation of steel that slams the ground and Stuns enemies.
MageSpec1_Desc: Shadow Mages wield power from the beyond dealing moderate Shadow damage.
MageSpec2_Desc: Cold Mages attacks will chill enemies eventually freezing them in their tracks.
MageSpec3_Desc: Bone Mages use their own bodies as projectiles, dealing heavy damage at the cost of their own Life.
Necro_Info: Either select an {icon:Necro_MiniSlot_Upgrade, 2} {c_highlight}Upgrade{/c} or {Icon:Necro_MiniSlot_Sacrifice, 2} {c_highlight}Sacrifice{/c} your summons.
UpgradeAvailableDesc: {c_green}Upgrade Available{/c}: Open the {c_white}Book of the Dead{/c} to select an upgrade.
WarriorSpec1_Desc: Sword-wielding skeletal minions that deal {c_number}30%{/c} increased damage but have {c_number}15%{/c} reduced Life.
WarriorSpec3_Desc: Wields a powerful scythe that has a special wind-up attack, dealing heavy damage every {c_number}10{/c} seconds.
